front.title: Design Requirements for the More Instant Messaging Interoperability (MIMI) Transport Protocol

abstract.t: This document describes design requirements on the More Instant Messaging Interoperability (MIMI) Working Group provider-to-provider message transport protocol. These requirements are based on the requirements of the group encryption using the Messaging Layer Security (MLS) protocol and requirements for high volume message transfer which would be needed with large messaging providers.
